text: Jhon Jarrín (21 December 1961 — 9 March 2021) was an Ecuadorian track cyclist. He competed in the individual and team pursuit events at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Jarrín killed after being hit by a car in Cuenca, Ecuador on 9 March 2021, aged 59. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Ecuador Category:Cyclists Category:Pedestrian road incident deaths
title: Jhon Jarrín
